name: SOFICRAFT
description: Fantasy jewelry e-commerce showcase with Next.js, GSAP animations, and Sass styling

project.purpose: Showcase custom fantasy/fairy-themed jewelry with immersive animations
project.targetAudience: Young adults interested in fantasy/cosplay, gift buyers

root.src/app: Next.js App Router - main application code

codePatterns.animations: GSAP for smooth animations - import gsap from 'gsap'
codePatterns.metadata: Next.js Metadata API in layout.tsx for SEO

gitWorkflow.main: Production stable branch - merged after testing
gitWorkflow.feature: Feature branches from develop - feature/xxx pattern
rules: Use conventional commits: feat:, fix:, docs:, style:, etc
Create Pull Request develop→main before production merge

patterns: Use GSAP timelines for complex sequences
animationGuidelines.lenis: Smooth scroll library (lenis@^1.3.17) - for smooth scrolling UX

developmentWorkflow.testing: npm run build to test production build
developmentWorkflow.linting: npm run lint to check code quality
developmentWorkflow.commits: git add, commit, push to origin/develop

keyConstraints.availability: Sophie is a nurse - limited development time (passion project)
keyConstraints.scope: Few orders per month target - not high-volume e-commerce
keyConstraints.focus: Customer immersion and artistic passion - not aggressive sales
keyConstraints.updates: Regular maintenance and feature updates via Claude Code

modelPreferences.reason: Best balance for GSAP animations, TypeScript, and Next.js
